main_definition: Refers to something that happens or is measured every three months, typically in relation to business performance or events.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In financial terms, pertaining to a report released every three months
meanings_and_examples.example: The company's quarterly earnings were higher than expected.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Relating to or occurring at intervals of three months
meanings_and_examples.example: She has her hair cut every quarterly appointment.
The year is divided into twelve monthly quarters, each representing one-fourth (or 25%) of the year's timeframe.
